title: ISic000208. I.Sicily inscription 000208
body:
Facsimile Images

1DM
2PRIM[---]
3IUS.[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of autopsy compared with earlier edition and photographs of ILTermini

translation

commentary

It is possible that we might restore Prim[igen]ius in lines 2-3, followed by the dedicatee's age in years (vixit), but it is impossible to know given the condition of the plaque.

bibliography

  • 1994.0781 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 131 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Ciofalo NSA 1889 92b https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
